sense.name: Cast a shadow over, possibly offering protection.
sense.examples: Shade your eyes when you step into the sunlight. Trees shade the courtyard. The buildings shade the sidewalks from both sunlight and rain.

sense.name: Represent the effect of shade or shadow on, as in art.
sense.examples: Shade the line drawing to give depth. I need to shade this drawing.

sense.name: Vary slightly, as of an idea.
sense.examples: The author shaded the initial message of the novel. Shade the meaning of the words.

sense.name: Pass from one quality such as color to another by a slight degree.
sense.examples: The butterfly wings shade to yellow. Her hair shades from black to brown. His beliefs shade from Conservative to Moderate.
